name: Northbrook Racquet Club
materials: Shoes
notes: Reuse-A-Shoe accepts all types of shoes can be brought in and collected, with the exception of: rollerblades, ice skates and winter boots. Shoes in any condition, from new or gently used, to those that are worn, will be accepted. Even those with stains or holes will be accepted. Please drop-off your shoes during operating/business hours.
